title: BackdropFilter
introductionEN: A widget that applies a filter to the existing painted content and then paints child. This effect is relatively expensive, especially if the filter is non-local, such as a blur.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它将过滤器应用于现有的绘制内容，然后绘制子项。这种效果相对昂贵，特别是如果滤镜是非局部的，例如模糊。
constructors: BackdropFilter({Key? key, required ImageFilter filter, Widget? child})

title: ClipOval
introductionEN: A widget that clips its child using an oval.
introductionCN: 使用椭圆剪辑其子项的小部件。
constructors: ClipOval({Key? key, CustomClipper<Rect>? clipper, Clip clipBehavior, Widget? child})

title: ClipPath
introductionEN: A widget that clips its child using a path.
introductionCN: 使用路径剪辑其子项的窗口小部件。
constructors: ClipPath({Key? key, CustomClipper<Path>? clipper, Clip clipBehavior, Widget? child})

title: ClipRect
introductionEN: A widget that clips its child using a rectangle.
introductionCN: 使用矩形剪辑其子项的小部件。
constructors: ClipRect({Key? key, CustomClipper<Rect>? clipper, Clip clipBehavior, Widget? child})

title: CustomPaint
introductionEN: A widget that provides a canvas on which to draw during the paint phase.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，提供在绘制阶段绘制的画布。
constructors: CustomPaint({Key? key, CustomPainter? painter, CustomPainter? foregroundPainter, Size size, bool isComplex, bool willChange, Widget? child})

title: DecoratedBox
introductionEN: A widget that paints a Decoration either before or after its child paints.
introductionCN: 在儿童绘画之前或之后绘制装饰的小部件。
constructors: DecoratedBox({Key? key, required Decoration decoration, DecorationPosition position, Widget? child})

title: FractionalTranslation
introductionEN: A widget that applies a translation expressed as a fraction of the box's size before painting its child.
introductionCN: 在绘制其子项之前应用表达为框大小的一小部分的翻译的小部件。
constructors: FractionalTranslation({Key? key, required Offset translation, bool transformHitTests, Widget? child})

title: Opacity
introductionEN: A widget that makes its child partially transparent.
introductionCN: 使子项部分透明的小部件。
constructors: Opacity({Key? key, required double opacity, bool alwaysIncludeSemantics, Widget? child})

title: RotatedBox
introductionEN: A widget that rotates its child by a integral number of quarter turns.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，可以将其子项旋转整数个四分之一圈。
constructors: RotatedBox({Key? key, required int quarterTurns, Widget? child})

title: Transform
introductionEN: A widget that applies a transformation before painting its child.
introductionCN: 在绘制其子项之前应用转换的窗口小部件。
constructors: Transform({Key? key, required Matrix4 transform, Offset? origin, AlignmentGeometry? alignment, bool transformHitTests, Widget? child})
